        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 var gr = new GlideRecord(current.table_name);
 
 if (gr.get(current.table_sys_id) && (new hr_CoreUtils().isCase(gr.table) || gr.table == hr.TABLE_TASK )) {
  var task;
  if (gr.table == hr.TABLE_TASK) {
   task = new GlideRecord(gr.table);
   task.get(gr.document);
   if (task.hr_task_type != "sign_document")
    return;
  } 
  if(new hr_PdfUtils().isValidPdfTemplate(gr.table, gr.document)) {
   var response = new hr_PdfUtils().createPdfForDocument(gr.table, gr.document, false);
   if(response.indexOf('Error') > 0)
    gs.addInfoMessage(response);
   else 
    closeHRTask(task);
  } else if (new GeneralHRForm().hasDraftDocument(gr.table, gr.document)) {
   if(gr.table == hr.TABLE_TASK){
    var draftDocGr = new GeneralHRForm().getDraftDocument(gr.table, gr.document);
    if(new hr_CoreUtils().isCase(draftDocGr.table)){//If it's Case, draft document for task wasn't created. This is possible while signing from native mobile App.
     var sys_id = gr.document;
     var table_name = gr.table;
     var hrCaseAjax = new sn_hr_core.hr_CaseAjax();
     var hrForm = hrCaseAjax.documentBody(table_name, sys_id, table_name, sys_id, 'false');
     var documentBody = hrForm.body;
     hrCaseAjax.setDocumentBody(documentBody, table_name, sys_id, table_name, sys_id, 'false', 'true');
    }
   }
   var draftDocument = new GeneralHRForm().getDraftDocument(gr.table, gr.document);
   new GeneralHRForm(draftDocument.table, draftDocument.document, draftDocument.target_table, draftDocument.target_id).generate();
   /* Close the HR task if type is sign document*/ 
   closeHRTask(task);
  }
 }
})(current, previous);

function closeHRTask(hrTask) {
 if(!gs.nil(hrTask)) {
  if ((hrTask.state == 18 || hrTask.state == 10) && hrTask.hr_task_type == 'sign_document') {
   if (hrTask.work_end.nil())
    hrTask.work_end = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
    
   hrTask.state = 3;
   hrTask.update();
  }
 }
}]]></script>
